array.string: Mixed use development with fine dining, sidewalk cafes ad boutiques
Adjacent to Whole Foods Market and Phillips Place
Controlled-entry building and covered tenant parking with elevator access
Numerous guest parking options: on-street, surface lot, and decks
Saltwater pool and sundeck with grilling station
Landscaped terraces for games, gatherings and relaxation
Club and game rooms for receptions and entertainment
Modern fitness center with electronic workout stations
